tag_list: coworking, florida, boynton-beach, startups, community-builder, social-networking, social-media, social-hybrid, seo, snasm
overview:
Visionary, Community Builder, Internet Business Developer, Search Engine Optimizer, and Social Media Maven

Mark Laymon is an Internet Business Developer, Community Organizer, Search Engine Optimization Specialist (SEO), Niche Portal Builder and Internet Marketing Strategist. Using sophisticated programming techniques targeting search engines and social media, he drives highly targeted Internet traffic to top quality sites.

Mark Laymon has a very broad selection of blogs, websites, and domains under his management. Mark Laymon mostly works with CMS Blogs, (Content Management Systems) which allows the targeting of content to push RSS feeds across many platforms that permit the maximum targeting of demographics.

Mark Laymon is the founder of one of Palm Beach Counties leading technology communities. New Tech Community has over 450 active members that attend monthly meetings revolving around unification of the local tech industry. http://newtechcommunity.com

Originally from Minnesota, Mark Laymon is an avid outdoors-man; big game hunting is just one of his passions in addition to fishing. Wild game and fish often provide the ingredients for his gourmet cooking. Today Mark can be found in South Florida chasing wild game in the Florida Everglades, scuba diving the many coral reefs, or raising sailfish in his kayak.
